show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: 134 Troy Carter and Patrick Leung on preventing speculative boom around the $5T carbon potential of degraded land
subtitle: 134 Troy Carter and Patrick Leung on preventing speculative boom around the $5T carbon potential of degraded land
summary:
Troy Carter and Patrick Leung of Earthshot Labs discuss how compelling visualisations through their simulator impact our regenerative transition on a global scale.
